Main Event: Luis Palomino (Miami, FL) vs. Martin Brown (Tampa, FL) Co-Main Event: Chad Mendes (Sacramento, CA) vs. Joshuah Alvarez Main Card: Mike Perry (Orlando, FL) vs. Julian Lane (Mansfield, OH) Main Card: Britain Hart (Bedford, VA) vs. Christine Ferea (Las Vegas, NV) Main Card: Francesco Ricchi (Fort Lauderdale, FL) vs. Jake Bostwick Main Card: Brian Foster (Granite City, IL) vs. Robbie Peralta (Escondido, CA) Main Card: John Michael Escoboza vs. Zion Tomlinson, Sr. (Roanoke, VA)
